title: Ex-NSA Employee Allegedly Tried to Sell Classified Info to an Undercover FBI Agent for Crypto
description: A former employee at the National Security Agency (NSA) has been charged with attempting to transmit classified defense information to a representative of a foreign government. He was arrested on Wednesday and made his initial appearance at a federal court on Thursday.

title: New York to Ban Gas-Powered Vehicles, Following California's Lead
description:
New York is following in California’s tire treads, making drastic moves to cut greenhouse gas emissions. The Empire State will entirely ban the purchase of new petroleum-powered cars by 2035.
